content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hi Farhad, nice to meet you. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment. So, how much are you willing to pay? Remember, let's focus only on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I realize your goal is different from mine but with limitations given, I am careful with my expenses due to my responsible nature. However, in this negotiation, I don't want to continue as my objective is to obtain the lowest price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my focus is on reducing the cost. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
